feed.title: Revapi - Full-featured API checker for Java and beyond.

entry.title: Introducing Online API Difference Checking
entry.author: Lukas Krejci
entry.summary: Starting today there is an online tool for checking the difference between different versions of libraries on https://diff.revapi.org.
entry.content: Starting today there is an online tool for checking the difference between different versions of libraries on https://diff.revapi.org.

entry.title: New Releases and Updates to The Site
entry.author: Lukas Krejci
entry.summary: After a couple of silent weeks I've finally managed to release new versions of the Revapi components. There are exactly 2 fixes, one new feature and many improvements to the site.
entry.content: After a couple of silent weeks I've finally managed to release new versions of the Revapi components. There are exactly 2 fixes, one new feature and many improvements to the site.

entry.title: New Releases
entry.author: Lukas Krejci
entry.summary: There hasn't been much public progress on Revapi lately but it nevertheless slowly crawls forward in its quest to become the best programming API checking tool in the multiverse :)
entry.content: There hasn't been much public progress on Revapi lately but it nevertheless slowly crawls forward in its quest to become the best programming API checking tool in the multiverse :)
